oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Roster of Second Battalion, Second Training Regiment
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This printed multi-page roster is bound in heavy gray paper with the front imprinted "Roster of the Second Battalion / Second Training Regiment / Southern Military Training Camp / Fort Oglethorpe, Georgia / June 3 - 30, 1916." James McFerren Johnston is included in the list. Johnston served in the Ord. Corps and was attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div.
